data.text: Mi anyigbadzitɔwo katã, mise esia;
mi ame dzodzrowo kple amegãwo,
Nye nu agblɔ nunya ƒe nyawo,
Maƒu to anyi ɖe lododo ŋu,
Nu ka ta mavɔ̃ ne ŋkeke vɔ̃wo va,
ame siwo ɖoa dzi ɖe woƒe kesinɔnuwo ŋu,
Ame aɖeke mate ŋu aɖe nɔvia ƒe agbe
Agbeƒlega menye ga sue o,
amea nanɔ agbe tegbee,
Ame sia ame kpɔe be nunyala kuna;
Togbɔ be anyigbawo le wo
Togbɔ be kesinɔnu geɖewo
Esia nye nu si dzɔna ɖe
Woayi tsiẽƒe abe alẽwo ene,
Ke Mawu aɖe nye agbe tso ku me,
Ne ame aɖe zu kesinɔtɔ la,
elabena ne eku la, matsɔ naneke ɖe asi o,
Togbɔ be ebu eɖokui ame si woyra,
ayi aɖawɔ ɖeka kple fofoa ƒe dzidzime
Ame si si kesinɔnuwo le, evɔ gɔmesese mele esi o la
